data.text: @NikiDettman Yes!! We are friends and neighbors. She's the best!
@kristenhowerton Wait...did I just see my friend Anna Hulbert in that video?!? You know Anna? I’ve known and loved her for more than 30 years!!!
@kristenhowerton Happy for you. I volunteered last week giving vaccines in my area and received my first Moderna injection. I'll be happy to get my second in near future

This song is one we end every Beer and Hymns with, and it's become our mantra. We know it's hyperbole . . . there will be more hard times, and the grief of the past year is still there. But I'm feeling the hopefulness of those refrains today.
